artist: Painter: After Anthony van Dyck; Engraver: John Corner
description: half length seated portrait of a man turned left, looking at viewer; PL hand resting on a book; in a rectangular frame with a small reproduction of artist's painting of the HOly Family below portrait

title: Simon Vouet
